description:
The Game Award for Game of the Year is an award presented annually by The Game Awards. It is given to a video game judged to deliver the best experience across creative and technical fields. The Game Awards are scheduled to be held on December 8, 2022 at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles, California, USA.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if "Elden Ring" wins The 2022 Game Award for Game of the Year. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If no game wins The 2022 Game Award for Game of the Year by December 22, 2022, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from The Game Awards (e.g. information found at thegameawards.com/), including live broadcast, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Will 'Elden Ring' win Game of the Year?
